name: Defenders of Adacan
description:
In old Mesopotamia the city of Adacan is in trouble. The Lion gate has fallen. The enemies is marching against the city, lead by their god.

Adacan's goddess is missing.

What can one small slave girl called Semi do?

Puzzles and mingames to solve.

Two minigames now available as standalone games.

* Star map, and

* Game of Ur
